data.title: Southern California CPA Firm
data.meta_description: Duffy Kruspodin, LLP, a reputable accounting firm serving the San Diego and Los Angeles areas in southern California. Specializing in financial consulting, audits and business valuation and accounting.
data.text:
Duffy Kruspodin, LLP is your premier choice for comprehensive accounting services in Southern California. With over 30 years of experience, our CPA firm has earned a reputation as a reliable partner in the financial success of individuals and businesses throughout the region. Our team of highly skilled professionals are commitment to excellence and personalized client service setting us apart from other CPA firms as a leading Southern California accounting firm.

Duffy Kruspodin, LLP has been our lifeline for developing our businesses for for over 30 years. We wouldn't think of changing direction or making a major decision without their sage advice. Our relationship through the years has been extraordinary. We are genuinely grateful for all the assistance theyâ€™ve given us through the start-up, expansion and sale of our companies.

Drs. Gordon and Karen B.

Real Estate Investors, Educators

I have been working with Duffy Kruspodin, LLP for almost twenty years now. While that already speaks for itself, I have to say that I feel I am working with the best accounting firm in our area! They respond to each and every email and phone call the same day and I would recommend them to anybody looking for a good CPA!

Alexandra B.

Furniture Designer
